heading: HB00119
0: AN ACT UPGRADING THE MINIMUM SALARY GRADE LEVEL OF TEACHERS FROM SALARY GRADE 11 TO 19
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00119
FULL TITLE : AN ACT UPGRADING THE MINIMUM SALARY GRADE LEVEL OF TEACHERS FROM SALARY GRADE 11 TO 19
ABSTRACT : Seeks to upgrade the present minimum salary grade level of public school teachers in the elementary and secondary schools from Grade 11 to grade 19, provided however, that the salary upgrading shall be differentiated in accordance with the qualifications and length of service rendered by teachers and shall not be prejudiced by across-the-board salary adjustments.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
